hero.heroDescription: Al-Masdar International Recruitment Platform offers you the opportunity to search for the recruitment you want quickly, easily, and that suits your needs.
hero.speed: Speed of completion and accuracy of selection
hero.more: More than 10 nationalities to choose from

about.international: The International Source Recruitment Platform is a comprehensive electronic platform for an integrated experience in recruiting domestic workers, aiming to facilitate the procedures for recruiting domestic workers and increase the level of preserving the rights of all parties by informing employers and domestic workers of their rights and duties.

steps.chooseWoeker: Choose the worker you want based on his CV and your requirements
steps.payLabor: Pay labor fees through one of the contracted payment gateways
steps.receiveWoeker: Receive the worker and get a 3-month guarantee in case there is any problem or negligence on the part of the worker
steps.source: The International Source Recruitment platform helps you clear all worker procedures
steps.architecture: The architecture chosen by you reaches the territory of the Kingdom

job.searchRecruitment: Search for the recruitment you want now
job.jobDescription: The Al Masdar International Recruitment Platform team is keen to provide speed and quality, and supervises the arrival and reception of trained workers, through a wide range of jobs that you can choose from according to your desires and needs. All you have to do is choose the domestic workers that are appropriate for you.

join.joinDescription: The Al-Madar International platform provides you with the ability to communicate with the largest recruitment offices, reach those wishing to work, and choose the appropriate person for your needs among more than 10 different nationalities around the world.

contact.contactUs: You can contact us by phone or email us, and a member of the customer service team will respond to your inquiries as quickly as possible, as our goal is always your comfort.

faster.title: Faster
faster.content: Than any other job application platform.

office.title: Office
office.content: Licensed in all regions of the Kingdom.

auth.joinMasdar: Join the Al Masdar International Recruitment platform to be able to obtain the workers allocated to you
auth.notHaveAccount: Do you not have an account on the International Source Recruitment platform?
auth.haveAccount: Do you already have an account on the platform?
auth.useInternational: use the international source platform for recruitment
auth.pleaseEnterBasicInformation2: Please enter you basic information, user name and create password for your account
auth.pleaseEnterBasicInformation4: Complete your company information, company name and your company address
auth.pleaseEnterBasicInformation3: Enter your address, country and vat-number
auth.pleaseEnterValidTax: Please enter valid value, should be Between 8 to 20 Characters Long.
auth.forgetPasswordText: Don’t worry! It happens. Please enter your email and we’ll send OTP to your email
auth.checkEmail: Please enter the change code sent to your mobile number
auth.notReceive: You did not receive the password?
auth.welcomeToMasdar: Welcome to the Al Masdar International Recruitment platform

validations.fullNameLength: Full name length must be larger than or equal 2
validations.nameLength: Name length must be larger than or equal 2
validations.passwordPattern: Your password must be 8 or more characters, contains upper & lower case letters, numbers, at least one special character (!%*?&|...)
validations.notMatch: Password didn’t match, please try again*
validations.validVatId: Please enter valid vat number, must be Must Be Between 11 and 20 Characters Long.
validations.addressLength: Sorry! The Address Must Be Between 4 And 100 Characters Long.
validations.oneNumeric: It must contain one or more numbers
validations.eightChars: Must contain at least 8 characters (12 characters recommended)
validations.containChar: It must contain at least one capital letter
validations.notContainInfo: It does not contain information such as name

footer.allRight: © Copyright reserved to Al Masdar International Recruitment Platform
footer.subscribe: Subscribe with us to be informed of the latest additions

offices.heroDescription: Enjoy the ability to communicate with a large group of licensed recruitment offices around the Kingdom to obtain the best possible employment
offices.heroSearchPlaceHolderText: Are you looking for a specific office?

policies.heroDescription: The Saudi Constitution and law set standards and concepts for domestic workers that must be followed to guarantee the rights of both parties (the worker and the employer)

duties.title: Duties of the employer and employee
duties.type2: The employer's duties towards the domestic service worker
duties.btnDutiesWorkers: Download rights and duties of domestic workers

conatct.description: Request your worker now and our customer service team will contact you as soon as possible
conatct.conatctReasonTitle: What is the purpose of communication?
conatct.conatcTitle: Provide us with some information about yourself

journey.heroDescription: Enjoy the ideal experience in choosing your domestic workers through simple steps through the Al-Masdar International Recruitment platform

salary.salaryDescribtion: The salary is agreed upon in coordination with the employer and the domestic worker, and all terms and conditions are clarified in order to preserve the rights and duties of all parties. The office periodically follows up on the request to ensure that everyone adheres to the agreed upon contract. All you have to do is select the worker.

box.title: The platform provides a guarantee in the event of a worker’s absence or refusal to work
box.description: The Al Masdar International Recruitment Platform team is keen to provide speed and quality in performance, and supervises the arrival and reception of trained workers, from the request for advice until the full start of work.

faqs.heroDescription: You can view the most frequently asked questions about the services of the Al Masdar International Recruitment platform

termsAndConditions.heroDescription: You can view the policies and conditions of our platform

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Do you need help or inquiries? Leave your message and one of our customer service members will contact you as soon as possible

completeOrder.title: Confirm Resume Order
completeOrder.subtitle: Please review the information below before confirming the order

notice.title: Notices
notice.description: The request is reviewed with customer service representatives, and to ensure your rights, payment must be made through the Musaned platform
